block.p: Theater

'FOOTLOOSE,' by Amas Musical Theater, at the Lion Theater, 410 West 42nd Street, Clinton, (212)279-4200. Tonight at 7:30; tomorrow at 3 and 7:30 p.m.; Sunday at 3 and 7:30 p.m. Tickets: $18; students, $12. Through May 22.

'CHANTECLER,' Edmond Rostand's fable, with masks, puppets and music, by the Adhesive Theater Project, at the Clemente Soto Vélez Cultural Center, 107 Suffolk Street, second floor, Lower East Side, (212)353-3101. Tuesdays through Fridays at 8 p.m.; Saturdays at 2 and 8 p.m.; Sundays at 5 p.m. Through May 22. Tickets: $18. This Sunday at 3 p.m., a puppet and mask workshop; fee, $5 per child.

'DADDY WAS A LEPRECHAUN,' a musical by the Hunter College Department of Theater and the Mad Hatters, at Loewe Theater at Hunter College, 68th Street, near Park Avenue, (212)772-4448. Today at 10:30 a.m. and 7:30 p.m. and tomorrow at 2 p.m. Tickets: $12; students, $5.

'THE RED SNEAKS,' an updated ''Red Shoes'' by Elizabeth Swados, at the Harry De Jur Playhouse, Henry Street Settlement, 466 Grand Street, Lower East Side, (212)352-3101. Fridays at 7:30 p.m.; Saturdays at 3 and 7:30 p.m.; Sundays at 3 p.m.; through May 22. Tickets: $10; children, $5.
'LOVE, SHAKESPEARE,' musical scenes by the Acting Company, tomorrow at 2 p.m. at the Acorn, 410 West 42nd Street, Clinton, (212)279-4200. Tickets: $15.
Events

'DANCE MAKERS AND GROUND BREAKERS,' by the Loco-Motion Dance Theater for Children, tomorrow night at 7 at New York University, Loewe Theater, 35 West Fourth Street, Greenwich Village, (212)979-6124. Tickets: $10; students, $5.

'MUSIC TELLS A STORY,' Saint-Saens' ''Carnival of the Animals,'' by the Little Orchestra Society of New York, tomorrow at 10:30 a.m. and noon and Sunday at 1 and 2:30 p.m. at the Kaye Playhouse, 68th Street, near Park Avenue, (212)971-9500. Tickets: $40.

'GOLDBERG'S VARIATIONS,' with animation and sound effects, by the Andy Biskin Sextet, tonight at 8, tomorrow at noon and 8 p.m. and Sunday at noon at the Bowery Poetry Club, 308 Bowery, near Bleecker Street, East Village, (212)614-0505. Tickets: $15; under 12, $10.
JAZZ CLARINET, with magic, by Perry Robinson, Sunday at 3 p.m. at the Brooklyn Conservatory of Music, 58 Seventh Avenue, Park Slope, Brooklyn, (718)622-3300. Tickets: $15; children, $5.

HEALTH AND SPORT JAMBOREE, with free events and workshops, tomorrow, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., at Icahn Stadium, Randalls Island. Sponsored by the New York Road Runners Foundation. Information: (212)423-2227.

ANNUAL FAMILY PICNIC, to raise funds for a summer camp program, Sunday, 3 to 5:30 p.m., at Norman's Landscape, Central Park, reachable from the West 86th Street entrance. Sponsored by Grand Street Settlement. Tickets: $100 to $500. Rain date, May 22. Information: (646)201-4284.
For Children.
Theater
